text: Robert Jones (born June 26, 1979) is an American basketball coach, currently the head men's basketball coach at Norfolk State University.http://www.nsuspartans.com/coaches.aspx?rc=461&path;=mbball He was named interim head coach on April 15, 2013, and was named full head coach in February 2014. In 2019, he was awarded the Skip Prosser Man of the Year Award. ==Head coaching record== ===College=== ==References== Category:1979 births Category:Living people Category:American men's basketball coaches Category:American men's basketball players Category:Bard Raptors men's basketball coaches Category:Basketball coaches from New York (state) Category:Basketball players from New York (state) Category:College men's basketball head coaches in the United States Category:New Paltz Hawks men's basketball coaches Category:New Paltz Hawks men's basketball players Category:High school basketball coaches in the United States Category:Norfolk State Spartans men's basketball coaches Category:Sportspeople from Queens, New York
title: Robert Jones (basketball, born 1979)
